= Qizmt Command Line =

<table>
<tr><td> *Usage* </td><td> *Description* </td></tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`retrylogmd5 <logfile>`</div>
</td>
<td>writes all output to the logfile</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`edit <jobs.xml>`</div>
</td>
<td>edit the specified jobs source code XML file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`exec ["</xpath>=<value>"] <jobs.xml>`</div>
</td>
<td>run the jobs source code XML file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`addmachine <host>`</div>
</td>
<td>add a machine to the cluster</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`removemachine <host>`</div>
</td>
<td>remove a machine from the cluster</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`ps`</div>
</td>
<td>distributed processes, schedule and queue info</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`who`</div>
</td>
<td>show who is logged on</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`history [<count>]`</div>
</td>
<td>show command history</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`killall`</div>
</td>
<td>kill all jobs, clean any orphaned intermediate data</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`gen <output-dfsfile>`</div>
<div>`<outputsize>`</div> 
<div>`[type=<bin|ascii|word>]`</div> 
<div>`[row=<size>]`</div> 
<div>`[writers=<count>]`</div> 
<div>`[rand=custom]`</div> 
</td>
<td>generate random binary, ascii or word data</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`combine <inputfiles...> [+ <outputfile>]`</div>
</td>
<td>combine files into one</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`format machines=localhost`</div>
</td>
<td>format machines=localhost</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`info [<dfspath>[:<host>]]`</div>
<div>`[-s short host name]`</div> 
<div>`[-mt multi-threaded]`</div> 
</td>
<td>information for DFS or a DFS file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`head <dfspath>[:<host>:<part>] [<count>]`</div>
</td>
<td>show first few lines of file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`put <netpath> [<dfspath>[@<recordlen>]]`</div>
</td>
<td>put a file into DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`fput files|dirs=<item[,item,item]>|@<filepath to list>`</div>
<div>`[pattern=<pattern>]`</div> 
<div>`[mode=continuous]`</div> 
<div>`[dfsfilename=<targetfilename>]`</div> 
</td>
<td>put files into DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`putbinary <wildcard> <dfspath>`</div>
</td>
<td>put binary into DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`get [parts=<first>[-[<last>]]] <dfspath> <netpath>`</div>
</td>
<td>get a file from DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`fget <dfspath>`</div>
<div>`<targetFolder>[ <targetFolder> <targetFolder>] |`</div> 
<div>`@<filepath to target folder list> [-gz] [-md5]`</div>
</td>
<td>get a file from DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`getbinary <dfspath> <netpath>`</div>
</td>
<td>get binary from DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`del <dfspath|wildcard>`</div>
</td>
<td>delete a DFS file using multiple threads</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`rename <dfspath-old> <dfspath-new>`</div>
</td>
<td>rename a DFS file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`getjobs <netpath.dj>`</div>
</td>
<td>archive all jobs</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`putjobs <netpath.dj>`</div>
</td>
<td>import jobs archive</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`ls`</div>
</td>
<td>DFS file listing</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`countparts <dfspath>`</div>
</td>
<td>get parts count of a file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`invalidate <cacheName> <fileNodeName>`</div>
</td>
<td>invalidate a file node of the cache</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`health [-a check DFS health]`</div>
<div>`[-v verify driver]`</div> 
<div>`[-mt multi-threaded]`</div> 
</td>
<td>Show the health of the machines in the cluster</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`examples`</div>
</td>
<td>generate example jobs source code</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`importdir <netpath>`</div>
</td>
<td>import jobs into DFS</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`listinstalldir`</div>
</td>
<td>List all installed directories</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`harddrivespeedtest [<filesize>]`</div>
</td>
<td>Test write/read hard drive speed</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`networkspeedtest [<filesize>]`</div>
</td>
<td>Test upload/download network speed test</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`exechistory`</div>
</td>
<td>List the most recent executed commands</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`cputemp`</div>
</td>
<td>List cpu temperature</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`ghost`</div>
</td>
<td>List ghost data files</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`perfmon <network|cputime|diskio|availablememory>`</div>
<div>`[a=<Number of readings to get.  Return average.>]`</div> 
<div>`[t=<Number of threads>]`</div> 
<div>`[s=<Milliseconds of sleep to take between readings>]`</div> 
</td>
<td>get Perfmon counter readings</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`perfmon generic`</div>
<div>`o=<Object/category name>`</div> 
<div>`c=<Counter name>`</div>
<div>`i=<Instance Name>`</div>
<div>`[f Display readings in friendly byte size units]`</div>
<div>`[a=<Number of readings to get.  Return average.>]`</div>
<div>`[t=<Number of threads>]`</div>
<div>`[s=<Milliseconds of sleep to take between readings>]`</div>
</td>
<td>specify a Perfmon counter to read</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`packetsniff [t=<Number of threads>]`</div>
<div>`[s=<Milliseconds to sniff>]`</div> 
<div>`[v verbose]`</div> 
<div>`[a include non-cluster machines]`</div> 
</td>
<td>Sniff packets</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`md5 <dfsfile>`</div>
</td>
<td>compute MD5 of DFS data file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`checksum <dfsfile>`</div>
</td>
<td>compute sum of DFS data file</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`sorted <dfsfile>`</div>
</td>
<td>check if a DFS data file has sorted lines</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`nearprime <positiveNum>`</div>
</td>
<td>find the nearest prime number</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`genhostnames <pattern> <startNum>`</div>
<div>`<endNum> [<delimiter>]`</div> 
</td>
<td>generate host names</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`viewlogs [machine=<machineName>]`</div>
<div>`[count=<number of entries to return>]`</div> 
</td>
<td>view log entries</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`clearlogs`</div>
</td>
<td>clear logs from all machines in the cluster</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`maxuserlogsview`</div>
</td>
<td>view maxUserLogs configuration</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`maxuserlogsupdate <integer>`</div>
</td>
<td>update maxUserLogs configuration</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`maxdglobalsview`</div>
</td>
<td>view maxDGlobals configuration</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`maxdglobalsupdate <integer>`</div>
</td>
<td>update maxDGlobals configuration</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`recordsize <user-size>`</div>
</td>
<td>returns bytes of user-friendly size</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`swap <file1> <file2>`</div>
</td>
<td>file names to swap</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`regressiontest basic`</div>
</td>
<td>basic regression test Qizmt</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`kill <JobID>`</div>
</td>
<td>kill the specified Job Identifier</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`enqueue command=<value>`</div>
<div>`[ExecTimeout=<secs> Maximum seconds Qizmt exec can run`</div> 
<div>`OnTimeout=<tcmd>] Run on timeout; e.g.  Qizmt kill #JID#`</div> 
</td>
<td>Adds a command to the end of the queue</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`queuekill <QueueID>`</div>
</td>
<td>Removes the specified Queue Identifier</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`clearqueue`</div>
</td>
<td>Removes all entries from the queue</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`schedule command=<value> `</div>
<div>`start=<now|<datetime>> `</div> 
<div>`[frequency=<seconds>]`</div> 
<div>`[texceptions=<<datetime>[-<datetime>]>[,...]] ranges when not to run`</div> 
<div>`[wexceptions=<weekday>[,...]] whole weekdays not to run`</div> 
<div>`[wtexceptions=<wdtime>[,...]] time on day-of-week not to run`</div> 
</td>
<td><div>adds a command entry to the scheduler</div>
<div>(datetime format is `[M[/D[/Y]].][h:m[:s][AM|PM]]`)</div>
<div>(wdtime format is `<weekday>@<h:m[:s][AM|PM]>[-<h:m[:s][AM|PM]>]`)</div>
</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`pauseschedule <ScheduleID>`</div>
</td>
<td>Pauses the specified Schedule Identifier</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`unpauseschedule <ScheduleID>`</div>
</td>
<td>Un-pauses the specified Schedule Identifier</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`unschedule <ScheduleID>`</div>
</td>
<td>Removes the specified Schedule Identifier</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`clearschedule`</div>
</td>
<td>Removes all entries from the scheduler</td>
</tr>



<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`shuffle <source> <target>`</div>
</td>
<td>Shuffle underlying parts of a rectangular binary file, maintaining chunk order</td>
</tr>

<tr valign="top">
<td><div>`spread <dfsfile> <out-dfsfile>`</div>
</td>
<td>Spread a DFS file across the cluster</td>
</tr>

</table>
